channel.title: Red Hat OpenShift Serverless on Validated Patterns
channel.description: Recent content in Red Hat OpenShift Serverless on Validated Patterns

item.title: OPEA Chat QnA accelerated with AMD Instinct
item.description: This pattern aids with deployment of OPEAâ€™s Chat QnA RAG application, accelerated with AMD Instinct hardware.

item.title: OPEA QnA chat accelerated with Intel Gaudi
item.description: This pattern helps you deploy stack enabling Intel Gaudi Accelerator and it also deploys RAG application - Chat QnA

item.title: Intel AMX accelerated Medical Diagnosis
item.description: This pattern is based on a demo implementation of an automated data pipeline for chest X-ray analysis previously developed by Red Hat. The pattern is modified to utilize Intel AMX feature.

item.title: Emerging Disease Detection
item.description: This pattern is based on a demo implementation of an automated data pipeline for sepsis analysis previously developed by Red Hat.

item.title: Medical Diagnosis
item.description: This pattern is based on a demo implementation of an automated data pipeline for chest X-ray analysis previously developed by Red Hat.
